s2.ptxt: Measure the resistance between the terminals.
If the result is not as specified, replace the injector.

item.ptxt: This test involves high-pressure fuel and electricity.
Take every precaution regarding safe handling of both the fuel and the electrical parts.
Perform this test in a safe area, and avoid any sparks or flame.

s2.ptxt: Assemble SST as shown in the illustration.
Discharge the fuel system pressure (see page ).
Disconnect the No. 1 fuel hose from the fuel filter (See page ).
Disconnect the fuel pressure regulator from the fuel delivery pipe (See page ).

atten3.ptxt: Do not disconnect the No. 2 fuel hose from the fuel pressure regulator.

s2.ptxt: Connect SST to the fuel filter.
Connect SST (union) to the fuel pressure regulator with the 2 bolts.
Install the O-ring to the injector.
Assemble SST as shown in the illustration.

atten3.ptxt: Make sure that SST (adapter) and SST (clamp) are not loose and do not rattle.

s2.ptxt: Pass SST (tie band) through the loop on the handle of SST (clamp) to secure SST (clamp) to SSE (adapter).

item.ptxt: As SST (tie band) does not completely prevent SST (clamp) from becoming loose, do not subject the parts to any impacts while using them.
Before using SST (tie band), make sure that there is no deterioration, damage or cracks. If there are any abnormalities, replace SST.

atten4.ptxt: When removing SST (tie band), disengage the lock.

s2.ptxt: Check that SST (clamp) and SST (adapter) cannot be easily separated.
Install a vinyl tube to the injector.

atten2.ptxt: Install a suitable vinyl tube to the injector to contain any gasoline spray.

s2.ptxt: Put the injector into a graduated cylinder.

s3.ptxt: Turn the ignition switch to ON.
Select the Active Test and enter the following menus: Powertrain / Engine and ECT / Active Test / Control the Fuel Pump / Speed.

s2.ptxt: Connect SST (wire) to the injector and battery for 15 seconds and measure the injection volume with the graduated cylinder. Test each injector 2 or 3 times.

specitem.ptxt: 76 to 91 cc (4.6 to 5.6 cu. in.) per 15 seconds

item.ptxt: Make sure that SST (EFI inspection wire H) is securely connected.
Always do the switching at the battery side.

s2.ptxt: If the result is not as specified, replace the injector.

s3.ptxt: In the condition above, disconnect the test probes of SST (wire) from the battery and check the fuel leakage rate from the injector.
